page.title: 18MARWOOD N. LEISURE
page.content: People in this area tend to either work for themselves on the land or elsewhere and have large gardens, so much of their time is spent in this way. Apart from the Working Men's Club at Milltown which is not used at the moment because it needs a lot of repairs and alterations done to it, and the small Plymouth Brethren Chapel at Middle Marwood there are no other public buildings for leisure. People enjoy gardening, TV and following hobbies in their own homes. If they want to play badminton or go for a swim they have to go out of the area. Children like to ride their ponies and bikes. Some people like to go hunting while others prefer to go for a walk, camping or on the beach. Adventurers and Teenagers the church youth group meet here sometimes
